snippet: Popular dancehall reggae star Vybz Kartel and three co-defendants were convicted of murder Thursday in a high-profile trial under heavy security in this Caribbean country's supreme court....

headline.print_headline: Jamaican Rapper, 3 Others Convicted of Murder
headline.main: Jamaican Rapper, 3 Others Convicted of Murder

lead_paragraph: Popular dancehall reggae star Vybz Kartel and three co-defendants were convicted of murder Thursday in a high-profile trial under heavy security in this Caribbean country's supreme court.
